00015 #include "ui_nmrspectrumform.h"

00020 #include "nmrspectrumbase_impl.h"
00021 
00022 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, NMRSpectrum, "NMR field-swept spectrum measurement");
00023 
00024 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 XNMRSpectrum::XNMRSpectrum(const char *name, bool runtime,
00026                            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00027                            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00028                            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00029                            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00030     :
00031       XNMRSpectrumBase<FrmNMRSpectrum>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00032       m_magnet(create<XItemNode<XDriverList, XMagnetPS, XDMM> >("MagnetPS", false, drivers, true)),
00033       m_centerFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("CenterFreq", false)),
00034       m_resolution(create<XDoubleNode>("Resolution", false)),
00035       m_minValue(create<XDoubleNode>("FieldMin", false)),
00036       m_maxValue(create<XDoubleNode>("FieldMax", false)),
00037       m_fieldFactor(create<XDoubleNode>("FieldFactor", false)),
00038       m_residualField(create<XDoubleNode>("ResidualField", false))
00039 {
00040     connect(magnet());
00041 
00042     m_form->setWindowTitle(i18n("NMR Spectrum - ") + getLabel() );
00043     m_spectrum->setLabel(0, "Field [T]");
00044     m_spectrum->axisx()->label()->value(i18n("Field [T]"));
00045   
00046     centerFreq()->value(20);
00047     resolution()->value(0.001);
00048     fieldFactor()->value(1);
00049     maxValue()->value(5.0);
00050     minValue()->value(3.0);
00051 
00052     m_conCenterFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_centerFreq, m_form->m_edFreq);
00053     m_conResolution = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_resolution, m_form->m_edResolution);
00054     m_conMin = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_minValue, m_form->m_edMin);
00055     m_conMax = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_maxValue, m_form->m_edMax);
00056     m_conFieldFactor = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_fieldFactor, m_form->m_edFieldFactor);
00057     m_conResidualField = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_residualField, m_form->m_edResidual);
00058     m_conMagnet = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_magnet, m_form->m_cmbFieldEntry);
00059 
00060     centerFreq()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00061     resolution()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00062     minValue()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00063     maxValue()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00064     fieldFactor()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00065     residualField()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00066 }
00067 bool
00068 XNMRSpectrum::onCondChangedImpl(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node) const
00069 {
00070     return (node == m_residualField) || (node == m_fieldFactor) || (node == m_resolution);
00071 }
00072 bool
00073 XNMRSpectrum::checkDependencyImpl(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const {
00074     shared_ptr<XMagnetPS> _magnet = *magnet();
00075     shared_ptr<XDMM> _dmm = *magnet();
00076     if(!(_magnet || _dmm)) return false;
00077     if(emitter == _magnet) return false;
00078     if(emitter == _dmm) return false;
00079     return true;
00080 }
00081 double
00082 XNMRSpectrum::getFreqResHint() const {
00083     double res = fabs(*resolution() / *maxValue() * *centerFreq()); 
00084     res = std::min(res, fabs(*resolution() / *minValue() * *centerFreq()));
00085     return res * 1e6;
00086 }
00087 double
00088 XNMRSpectrum::getMinFreq() const {
00089     double freq = -log(*maxValue()) * *centerFreq();    
00090     freq = std::min(freq, -log(*minValue()) * *centerFreq());
00091     return freq * 1e6;
00092 }
00093 double
00094 XNMRSpectrum::getMaxFreq() const {
00095     double freq = -log(*maxValue()) * *centerFreq();    
00096     freq = std::max(freq, -log(*minValue()) * *centerFreq());
00097     return freq * 1e6;
00098 }
00099 double
00100 XNMRSpectrum::getCurrentCenterFreq() const {
00101     shared_ptr<XMagnetPS> _magnet = *magnet();
00102     shared_ptr<XDMM> _dmm = *magnet();
00103     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse = *pulse();
00104 
00105     ASSERT( _magnet || _dmm );
00106     double field;
00107     if(_magnet)
00108         field = _magnet->magnetFieldRecorded();
00109     else
00110         field = _dmm->valueRecorded();
00111 
00112     field *= *fieldFactor();
00113     field += *residualField();
00114     
00115     return -log(field) * *centerFreq() * 1e6;
00116 }
00117 void
00118 XNMRSpectrum::getValues(std::vector<double> &values) const {
00119     values.resize(wave().size());
00120     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < wave().size(); i++) {
00121         double freq = minRecorded() + i*resRecorded();
00122         values[i] = exp(-freq * 1e-6 / *centerFreq());
00123     }
00124 }
